title: Modern finishes and exposed brick details throughout the whole apartme
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


True 3 Bedroom in brand new building. Modern finishes and exposed brick details throughout the whole apartment. All bedrooms are large with oversized closets and windows. Bright and airy apartment gets lots of natural light. =

AMENITIES
• High Ceilings
• Hardwood floors
• Exposed brick
• Central A/C
• Video Intercom
• Laundry in building
• Outdoor Space
• Eat In Kitchen
• Dishwasher
• Stainless Steel Appliances
• Built in microwave
• Granite countertops
• Stone countertops

If you are interested in a showing please text Kirby at 929-243-4946 !!
Mention listing ID:84163!!
Must meet income and credit requirement.
